/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures, predominantly white and gray, are punctuated by occasional splashes of red and green, adding a touch of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. The street itself is a hive of activity, filled with cars and buses navigating their way through the city's arteries. Amidst the urban landscape, patches of greenery can be spotted, providing a refreshing contrast to the concrete jungle. The sky above is a clear blue, devoid of any clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day.
